data.title: Law firm and lawyer rankings from The Legal 500 Europe, Middle East & Africa guide
data.meta_description: Market-leading rankings and editorial commentary - see the top law firms & lawyers for Competition: EU and global in Belgium
data.text:
‘The EU and global practice of Cleary Gottlieb is the gold standard in European competition law practices. For me, they have the best lawyers, work the hardest and are the most result-oriented of all of the practices to choose from.’

‘You cannot do any better than Enrique González-Díaz. He knows the law better than the regulators, knows technologies and products, and is, in my opinion, the most articulate and persuasive lawyer in the entire EU.’

‘They have an incredible breadth of knowledge, and their standards are never below exceptional.’

‘This law firm offers a significantly high level of service in terms of response time, business acumen/industry knowledge, appropriateness of advice, strength-in-depth of team and value for money.’

‘The depth and breadth of their knowledge ensures that they are able to support every client’s business needs successfully and provide high quality, innovative legal solutions in the increasingly complex area of legislation and practice.’

‘Anastasios Tomtsis and Georgios Yannouchos are excellent legal advisors with numerous strengths and qualities such as correct judgement, analytical skills, creativity, perseverance and commitment.’

‘I primarily work with Ashwin van Rooijen and Dieter Paemen and a team of good young associates. One of the strengths of Clifford Chance is their ability to look at both sides of a matter.’

‘Even-keeled, practical and realistic in their assessments. Timely work and responses.’

‘The Brussels team were highly knowledgeable, proactive and solution-orientated in our efforts to engage with the EU. They also knew who to engage with and at what level.’

‘Eric White and Lode Van Den Hende took the lead on our efforts and assured we stayed on the most likely track for success.’

‘They are logical and also very practical because they know how the business works.’

‘Kyriakos Fountoukakos has stood out for a long time. He is of course the expert on EU competition law, but is also knowledgeable in global competition law practice, which gives you “packaged” advice as a global client. His friendly, soft communication style is also helpful for the clinets not to be panicked even when the situation is tough.’

‘They have a truly global reach and top antitrust lawyers in the major jurisdictions.’

‘Kyriakos Fountoukakos has significant expertise on antitrust and competition.’

‘The Herbert Smith team delves well into the details and commercial aspects of the matters they work on. They are great project managers and are able to pull from the firm’s resources across the globe to deliver insightful advice. They stick to deadlines and respond to feedback. They are able to interact effectively with non-lawyers and extract the information that they need. ’

‘Kyriakos Fountoukakos is a great lawyer, with a charismatic personality. He has great communication skills and is able to speak the language of business people. He is well connected in Brussels and can give insightful advice on strategic matters.’

‘The Jones Day competition team in Brussels has a specific smart understanding of the client’s constraints, business and needs. They are proactive in proposing new solutions, to fit in the best possible and compliant way with the client’s request.’

‘Alexandre Verheyden is a key contributor to the success of a deal, in complex and moving circumstances.’

‘Jones Day is able to bring the full team forward to serve the client, with inputs coming from both junior and senior members. They are very tuned into the concerns of the clients, and have very good knowledge of the relevant case law and how it may be relevant to a particular point. They are able to draft submissions in a way that is clear and compelling.’

‘Charlotte Breuvart has a good knowledge of EC case law and of the energy market and is able to combine this with a good understanding of client needs, and what this means for the positioning of arguments. She is genuinely nice to work with.’

‘A very collaborative team, enabling open discussions about the case.’

‘Kaarli Eichhorn – exceptional understanding of the industry and ability to explain complex competition law issues in a comprehensible manner.’

‘They are fast, practical and thoughtful in their advice.’

‘The Latham team handles several high profile and complex matters for us. They are special at understanding our complex business in a fast and comprehensive fashion. They are commercially sound, reliable and have a great sense of urgency. They delivery high quality and practical advice.’

‘Christos Malamataris is a rising star in the EU competition community. He is bright and fast at grasping the essential technical aspects requiring legal advice. Surely his period at the EU Commmision makes a difference and helps massively with risk assessment and mitigation. He is original and thinks out of the box. He’s incredibly competent, yet not only on the legal aspects.’

‘Responsive, practical guidance.’

‘Héctor Armengod is well-qualified, responsive and quick to identify key issues.’

‘The team at Latham & Watkins is simply excellent, and their efficacy benefits from a rare team spirit.’

‘Sven Völcker is an experienced and pragmatic partner, who is capable of identifying the most salient issues in complex situations, and providing a clear description of what is at stake.’

‘Excellent team, very profound antitrust expertise, very pragmatic advice.’

‘Lars Kjølbye – outstanding antitrust partner. Responsiveness, industry know-how, excellent and pragmatic advice.’

‘Industry knowledge, insightfulness, practical view, strong litigation practice.’

‘Assimakis Komninos is a certainty when it comes to delivering timely and high quality advice, insights and support.’

‘The White & Case Brussels team is a litigation powerhouse and expertly handles complex antitrust cases. They are fierce in court and get the argument across in a simple and efficient manner.’

‘We particularly enjoy working with Mark Powell, Irina Trichkovska and Assimakis Komninos, are all stand-out individuals and superb litigators. Their team of junior lawyers is also very smart and knowledgeable.’

‘Mark Powell is one of the finest EU antitrust litigators on the market. He has a unique superpower that grabs the attention of the Court. He sets out complex legal arguments in a simple, easy to understand, way. Assimakis Komninos is a very charismatic litigator, who has a unique style when getting his arguments across to the Court.’

‘Mark Powell and Irina Trichkovska worked devotedly and efficiently for years on a complicated case which is important for our firm.’

‘Strati Sakellariou-Witt is an outstandingly capable, proactive and client-focused advisor. Her experience with EU competition law and multi-jurisdictional merger control is first rate. Totally cool under pressure, Strati is committed to anticipating the needs of our large global organisation and consistently delivers comprehensive legal advice in a business-friendly manner.’

‘Katarzyna Czapracka is a highly commercial and effective lawyer. She understand the telecoms and media industry and how competition policy plays out in this sector. She takes the time to understand what her clients need and to see how to apply the law to their advantage.’

‘Paul Johnson and Ola McLees have an excellent feeling for the industry in which I work and the competition law and related issues that arise. I can call them and instantly brief them as they are well versed in sector issues and can draw on expertise and developments in other sectors or countries, to inform my organisation’s path.’

‘Very time responsive, experts in their fields and always thinking outside the narrow range of our enquiry. Also proactive in coming to us with ideas and intelligence that could be useful.’

‘The competition team at Baker McKenzie delivers excellent competition advice, both EU but also global. It is not only the advice but the team delivers a holistic view from a business perspective which is always to the point, succinct and on time.’

‘Great insights.’

‘Very knowledgeable.’

‘The team is pragmatic, efficient and to-the-point.’

‘José Rivas is analytical, efficient and pragmatic.’

‘What makes this practice unique is José Rivas.’

‘José Rivas is a second-to-none lawyer with solid experience in all areas of competition law, EU law in general, and impressive experience in litigation before the EU courts. There would not be many lawyers in private practice with such extensive ligitation experience.’

‘Very sharp eye on telecoms regulations, responsive and quick. A multi-jurisdictional team allows the firm to provide complete advice to the client. I was very impressed.’

‘Hein Hobbelen stands out as a terrific competition and telecoms lawyer, and a very gifted communicator. He has also excellent coordination skills for cross-border projects.’

‘The quality of the work produced by the team has always been outstanding. The team provides an extremely high level of service through quick responses. The team has an extensive knowledge of competition and state aid law matters.’

‘They are genuinely dedicated, pragmatic advisers, well organised and work hard to ensure utmost client satisfaction.’

‘Working with Orestis Omran is always a positive experience. He has a knack for providing expert advice which is simple and comes across clearly. Orestis does not complicate matters even in the most complex competition law cases. He is well known for his ability to provide clear advice at very short notice, as well as for his strong analytical skills, honesty and integrity.’

‘Orestis Omran is an extraordinary practitioner with strong business acumen and is able to translate complex legal terms and concepts into comprehensive action plans.’

‘Joost Haans is very knowlegdable and able to truly think along with the business when it comes to complicated competition law issues.’

‘Excellent team of highly qualified lawyers with round-the-clock support. They closely combine their competition law knowledge with extensive expertise on EU regulatory laws. They are particularly strong on state aid where it is evident that they are highly appreciated by the European Commission officers.’

‘Highly recommended. Excellent knowledge of all aspects of competition law. The team has a practical approach to the often-complex interpretation and application of competition rules. They always provide insight into competition law issues and innovative solutions, taking account of the particulars of each case.’

‘Orestis Omran has unrivalled experience in providing cutting-edge technical and strategic advice in complex domestic and cross-border EU and competition law matters. Orestis and his team always strive to understand the clients’ needs, and always aim at serving them with realistic and solution-oriented advice.’

‘Closeness to the European Commission and other relevant EU institutions’ thinking, with deep understanding of their motivations and positioning on core issues. Able to deliver high-quality strategic advice relevant for our industry under tight deadlines for new developments in the competition space.’

‘William Leslie provides actionable and proactive advice relevant to our business.’

‘Linklaters is a heavyweight in competition law and regulation. Their lawyers are thought leaders and are at the forefront of developments in competition law and policy. They seem to be everywhere in terms of subject matter.’

‘William Leslie is extremely knowledgeable, has a strong grasp of competition law and regulation, as well as economics. He is sharp and commercially aware, and appears to be involved in virtually everything from digital platform regulation to merger control, FSR to FDI, telecoms regulation to vertical restraints.’

‘Neil Hoolihan is a highly skilled lawyer, with a great sense of humour. He is very much available and provides valuable hands-on advice.’

‘Pragmatic and commercial in providing risk-adjusted advice and solutions to assist clients with navigating through the ever-complex and changing regulatory regime of competition, foreign investment and foreign subsidies.’

‘Neil Hoolihan – absolutely stellar partner! As a seasoned advisor, he brings a commercial and sensible perspective that is based on sound analysis and works within the parameters of regulation. Always clear, succinct and with the client in mind. Always feel in very safe hands.’

‘William Leslie’s ability to truly (and quickly) understand our business and products is exceptional and means his advice is always tailored to our specific needs.’

‘The team with whom I worked was a collection of very talented individuals, with a deep knowledge of competition law.’

‘A great team to work with. Highly skilled at managing the different threads needed in merger clearances – across jurisdictions and regulatory processes – and capable of adapting to tight timelines with great flexibility.’

‘Alec Burnside is an acknowledged leader in the field.’

‘Excellent EU competition and regulatory team with deep knowledge and experience.’

‘Excellent capability.’

‘What distinguishes them from competitors is their unwavering commitment to going above and beyond for their clients, consistently delivering insightful solutions and personalised advice.’

‘Michael Okkonen is in particular a pleasure to work with, knowledgeable, modest, calm and capable and a very effective communicator.’

‘Alec Burnside knows the law and the key authorities in Europe inside and out.’

‘I have been working for a very long time with the competition team from Garrigues and they are excellent. Pragmatic and straight-to-the-point approach.’

‘Garrigues Brussels is one of the most qualified teams in EU competition. They have extended experience in relevant cases and they always have the support of experts from other offices.’

‘Alfonso Lamadrid has a deep knowledge of European law, but what is more important, he has always a practical approach, focusing on those issues or details that can positively influence the court’s decision.’

‘Kindness, rigour, responsiveness and an impressive ability to explain complex problems are the main assets of the Gide team.’

‘Romain Rard is an outstanding partner in all matters relating to EU policy.’

‘Knowledge of the particularities of our sector. Commitment. Empathy.’

‘Experts know the law but are also highly commercial, practical and strategic.’

‘Benoit Le Bret knows the law and, critically, how to use it effectively. A very good communicator with deep expertise in EU competition law.’

‘Working with Laurent Godfroid has been really easy, thanks to their reactivity but also broad expertise of the topics. They have very well taken into account our needs, delivering papers which were fully fit for purpose.’

‘Ségolène Pelsy is extremely knowledgeable and is great at keeping us proactively updated when it comes to competition developments. She is responsive and provides commercial and actionable advice that is greatly appreciated by clients.’

‘The team is very insightful, business-oriented, understands clients’ needs and businesses, and always delivers the best outcome meeting the highest of standards.’

‘Isabelle Rahman always knows when and whom to engage in order to deliver the best work product and in an efficient manner both time- and budget-wise.’

‘Isabelle Rahman is always well-prepared and informed, ahead of the curve, and provides to-the-point advice meeting rhe client’s business needs. Isabelle listens to the client and their needs which is very important. Never leaves a stone unturned. Always accurate, efficient and works within the set tight timeframes. Very pleasant to work with.’

‘Jacques Derenne is a heavyweight and a leading state aid expert. When it comes to knowledge, you cannot expect much more than he possesses.’

‘Oliver Heinisch is very practical and to the point, working with him is very efficient.’

‘Jacques Derenne is not only a leading practitioner in EU state aid law, but his extensive experience and knowledge across all areas of the antitrust and merger field single him out as one of the few individuals in the market who is able to provide expert advice on all areas of competition and state aid law.’

‘BonelliErede has been present in Brussels for very many years and has gained outstanding experience in dealing with EU institutions, the more so when Italian law issues are involved.’

‘Massimo Merola is a true authority on state aid and his findings and opinions are respected by clients and the Commission alike. His network of contacts in the European Commission and Parliament is unparalelled and tremendously important.’

‘I had the chance to work mostly with Alessandro Cogoni, who is an outstanding practitioner. He showed a great attitude towards technology, grasping without difficulties the peculiarities of our business, and rapidly detecting issues and possible solutions.’

‘BonelliErede’s team has in-depth knowledge of their clients’ industries, anticipating the issues that really matter in a case. They are creative in the way they present a case and understand their clients’ concerns.’

‘Massimo Merola is an extraordinary lawyer with a great strategic vision.’

‘The team is very efficient, very responsive and innovative, with an ability to manage cross-border transactions through resources from multiple offices.’

‘Bertold Bär-Bouyssière is our go-to lawyer for cross-border matters. With a strong litigation and advisory record, Bertold is very efficient, knowledgeable, highly responsive, and can address queries and deploy resources in a very impressive timeline! And the quality of deliverables is always beyond expectations.’

‘The team is well-equipped and able to handle complex EU and national antitrust cases. They are responsive and easy to work with.’

‘Jean-Nicolas Maillard is getting more and more involved in prominent antitrust cases, in particular before the French Competition Authority. He is gaining increasing recognition from the market for his smart and facilitating approach and amiability.’

‘Great inter-personal touch.’

‘Jean-Nicolas Maillard has been particularly proactive and willing to engage with the cllient to ensure they had all the information necessary to provide sound advice.’

‘Ulrich Soltész is a great sparring partner for academic and practical discussions about state aid issues in particular.’

‘Gleiss Lutz has a very competent, very client-orientated team and in-depth knowledge of all relevant competition law matters.’

‘The team composition has remained stable over the years and is perfectly adapted to our needs. The contact persons are clearly defined and the firm has a clear division of competences. There is flexibility and short-term availability, if necessary. The advice is provided in very clear and understandable terms. The lawyers have a very professional attitude and there is always a very friendly atmosphere.’

‘This practice is not only technically competent and always up to date, it has also demonstrated a strong link between practitioners working on different matters and in different countries, enabling it to provide fast, sound and seamless advice. The business acumen of the partners is also of great value, allowing clients to be supported with a cross-matter approach which is extremely effective.’

‘My impression has been extremely good, especially due to the constant availability (even with very short deadlines), the high level of competency and the ability to be able to provide short summaries when that is needed and to provide more context around a topic/question when that is needed.’

‘ I want to mentioned Francesco Carloni who I would recommend to anyone.’

‘Francesco Carloni and his EU team provided outstanding leadership and guidance to help us.’

‘The K&L Gates EU competition team offered exceptional legal expertise and navigated the transaction seamlessly across multiple European and non-European jurisdictions. Great teamwork.’

‘Francesco Carloni is a true and trusted business partner and exceptional leader. His expertise, unwavering support and responsiveness are outstanding. He is a great advisor and person to work with.’

‘K&L Gates’ partners and team are very skilled, prepared and reactive. One of the most important characteristic that makes this law firm different from the competitors is that the client has a sole partner as a point of contact at worldwide level. This characteristic is priceless in case of international project which involve many countries and subsidiaries.’

‘Francesco Carloni is a long-term, trusted advisor on everything from day-to-day to the most complex matters. He is knowledgeable, responsive, pragmatic and ensures reasonable billing for all work done. Without doubt, my first choice.’

‘Extensive experience in competition law.’

‘Strelia combines cross-border expertise with a deep understanding of EU competition law.’

‘Pierre Goffinet is a standout performer and a pleasure to cooperate with. He has a great willingness to dive deep into complex matters and to work at very short notice.’

‘Pierre Goffinet is an expert. He is pragmatic and truly adds value and understands economic, financial and business rationale.’

‘Pierre Goffinet is strong in many aspects, he worked for the Belgian Competition Authority and therefore knows how they work and act, he has a strong economic background and he is not only a competition lawyer but also a regulatory expert, which gives him a quite unique standing in the Belgium antitrust lawyer community.’

‘Great understanding of material issues and how regulators will likely react. Creative problem solving. Commercial approach. Good understanding of the business and market.’

‘They are substantively at the top of their legal game, as you would expect, but in addition they dig energetically and effectively into the facts.’

‘The whole team is strong, but I commend in particular Philipp Gnatzy, who shows terrific energy and effectiveness, and Thomas Wilson, who has very good antitrust judgement. They are a pleasure to work with.’

‘Exceptional practice. Very strong team of partners and associates. Experienced in the most complex deals. Exceptional speed of response and level of service.’

‘It is always a pleasure to work with Kirkland & Ellis. They have a pro-deal attitude, which fosters a productive working relationship, and are always at the forefront of the competition field.’

‘Thomas Wilson and Philipp Gnatzy are outstanding antitrust lawyers, with a very strong ability to handle complex and sophisticated matters. They are always committed to their clients and have extensive knowledge in different industries.’

‘Izzet Sinan is exceptional at managing the process of getting clearance for major mergers from the EC. He is unusually familiar with the inner workings of the European Competition competition staff and very familiar with the nuances of the merger review process in Europe. It helps that he is exceptionally engaged with the details of a transaction and familiar with every aspect of it.’

‘Izzet Sinan is a pleasure to work with, with a great sense of humour and a superb diplomat.’

‘The team is extremely commercial, taking time to understand the specifics of industries that, at first glance, may seem to overlap, however, with additional work, are not competitive. The team works extremely well with counterparties and is a huge asset to our firm.’

‘The team is always available and will always go the extra mile to work as part of our deal team and not as a regulatory add-on or side project.’

‘In addition to his professional attributes, Izzet Sinan embodies the highest ethical standards, ensuring that as we his client receive not only sound legal advice but also the utmost integrity and trustworthiness.’
